A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a very different star wars film\, probably explaining some bad reviews. It reminds me of Empire strikes back which was received quite poorly when it came out. This film has a great focus on characters and surprising developments. It addresses the issues that TFA was just a rehash and takes a lot of risks  Some bad reviews are seemingly just due to fan theories not coming true\, which is bizarre. Go in with no expectations and you'll find a powerful film with rich development that rewards multiple viewings.
